After the episode with Kristy, it had taken a lot of talking to get Lisa to agree, but she had eventually acquiesced to the activity, since you agreed to only go out into the hall, and only early enough in the morning that everyone else would be asleep still.

Ever since the Kristy episode, you had craved the adrenaline rush, and jogging down the hall was the closest you expected to get while keeping your girlfriend happy. Sure, it was no 'dangling over the gaping maw of a hungry woman', but you made do just imagining that someone was chasing after you to turn you into breakfast. On top of that, it felt good to build up a little sweat and to stay in healthy shape. Plus the thin carpet floor was soft while not allowing you to sink right down.

142.title: Miss South said that she had saved money, and o...

choices: Miss South, checking in on you.
The chemistry professor, Miss Jung?
Natasha, the sorority head?!
1422.content:
As the words leave her lips, your jaw drops open in shock. You really can't believe what you're hearing... Lisa, your adorable, loving girlfriend was ready to give you up over... Well, $10,000 was a lot of money, but still. It stung all the same, even if Miss South was extremely sexy. She had the whole Hot for Teacher vibe down to a fine art... But that wasn't what was important here!

"That is wonderful to hear, Lisa!" Miss South exclaimed, releasing the stack of cash as Lisa gripped it with both hands. "Now, why don't you hurry on to your next class? I'll just be a few minutes with my new toy." As she said it, she licked her lips. A shiver ran down your spine then, and you knew you needed to run... But Lisa was standing up to go, and Miss South was moving into action. Suddenly the tines of the professor's fork were pressing against the back of your knees, forcing you to fall backwards onto the utensil as it rose through the air. As you heard the office door close behind you, Miss South raises you up to her lips. "Oh I've waited forever to make you mine..." she sighed, her hot breath, sweet smelling like candy, washing over you.

As panic rises in your throat, Miss South giggles. And suddenly you're falling through the air to land with a splatter in a pool of viscous, tangy sauce. Miss South had dumped you into the bottom of her Chinese takeout box! You splutter and flounder for a moment, slipping about in the shallow puddle, but finally manage to find your balance. "What..." you breath, but Professor South's giggling from above drowns out your thoughts. "You stay right there, my tasty snack. I've got a few things to prepare for, then we will get out of here. I bet you haven't left campus since the accident." Then the box flaps shut around you.

What footing you'd found before disappears though, as your boxed in world sways about. Sauce rolls around the box, carrying you into stray pieces of broccoli and beef. Clearly Miss South is taking you somewhere... But you have no way to judge time or distance in this sticky darkness. Eventually, the motion does stop... and you're left to stew in silence as well as darkness. At least you have a moment to rest.

What feels like forever passes, though it couldn't have been that long, before something causes the box to jostle... and opens up the flaps above. At first the light blinds you after being trapped in the dark for so long, but when you can finally see, you can make out the face of...
1422.title: Sold, to the highest bidder!

choices: "...a flan!"
"...a pastry filling."
"...anything you're craving, Rita."
14222.content:
"Ugh, that is just like Hannah South to-" you hear the professor begin, before stopping suddenly. You can make out her cute button features on her skin. The 30 year old Asian woman was only known to you because you'd seen her in the halls once or twice before your shrinking accident. You'd never had a class with her or met her, but by the gleam in her eye... she knew all about you. "Well well well, what a surprise! You must be the decadent ingredient my prize student is always talking about. And here you are, discarded with Miss South's lunch? I can't simply let you go to waste like that." Which is when her hand reaches inside.

Despite how slippery you are the woman's soft fingers pinch you with ease, and raise you up into the world proper... which is much colder than the takeout box had been. "And what excellent timing, too." But before you can ask for clarification, you're forced between the woman's lips. Hot, slimy saliva drowns you while a soft tongue smothers you. Yet as Miss Jung tastes you, her fingers never release your body. Even as you feel her swallowing the saliva and sauce around you, your body remains clamped in her grip. Finally she pulls her fingers from her mouth, carrying you with them.

"Yes... just as delightful as she said. And now that you're all clean, you're ready to come with me," the professor titters, before swinging you through the air once more. This time you're tucked into her front pocket, which isn't particularly tight against her small chest, but is still too steep for you to get out without Miss Jung noticing. So... you wait. You rest and try to enjoy the ride, soaking in the warm fragrance of the woman's body. If she didn't have such vaguely dangerous plans for you, you could almost enjoy this... But then everything changes when the professor's hand returns once more to drag you into the light... to stare into Rita's face.

"Oh my god, you weren't lying about having found a high quality ingredient... I'm so excited, professor Jung!" Rita exclaims. From where you are, you can make out some of the room... and it's clear you're in the culinary section of the school. Your thoughts are interrupted though, as the professor announces, "I think we're going to make him into..."
14222.title: Troubles of a different kind

choices: Nope, who are people going to believe if Lisa tells, a professor or Lisa....
"Okay, I guess I can't get in the way of true love," Miss South says.....
143.content:
You always thought it would be a fun experience to be sucked and tasted by Lisa's professor, Miss South. So, today you got the courage to ask Lisa if she would let you get tasted by Miss South. Lisa brought you up to her ear and you whispered your request. Lisa looked at you questionably, you hoped you hadn't made her mad. To your surprise Lisa said okay, she wanted to make you happy. Lisa asked Miss South if she wanted to see for herself, what you tasted like. Miss South's eyes widened and she gave big grin, "I wouldn't pass on a chance to see what a cute little guy like Jason tastes like." Lisa handed you over to Miss South. You watched as Miss South stared deeply at you with her big green eyes. You saw her tongue come out and slide across her plump red lips. She opened her mouth and dangled you over it, "Are you ready for the best tongue bath you have had in your life?" You nodded eagerly, looking down into her gaping maw, seeing it salivate in anticipation of your tastiness. "This is the best idea I have had yet," you thought to yourself. Miss South lowered every inch of you softly on to her wet and warm tongue. You turned and saw out between the lips, Lisa with a little uneasy smile on her face, and then she disappeared as Miss South closed her mouth. Miss South moved you around her mouth, sucking and tasting you. You, pleasured and excited by the experience, rubbed yourself wildly against her tongue.
         Miss South moaned and "Mmmm-ed" at how delicious you were. A few minutes pass and you said, "Okay, I'm done. It's time to let me go." Miss South stopped sucking and you moved closer to the front of her mouth thinking that she was going to open it and let you out. To your surprise, Miss South didn't open her mouth; she whipped her tongue upward and you slid back and your legs went back and hung down the back of her throat. Suddenly, she took a huge gulp and you were pulled down her gullet by her strong throat muscles. Lisa looked on in terror as she saw the lump that was her boyfriend travel down the length of Miss South's neck.
         Miss South let out a little burp and rubbed her belly, "Lisa, thanks for the lunch appetizer, your boyfriend was delicious." You landed in Miss South's stomach, you couldn't believe that she swallowed you, it looked like she had planned this all along. You heard her say, "I knew one day you couldn't resist letting me see what Jason tasted like, with a yummy guy like him, you wanted other girls and women to know. You are so stupid, you should have known that some women wouldn't have the compassion not to eat the little guy. Now he is doomed to digest in my belly, what a yummy thought." You heard as Lisa started to cry, "Throw him up. He's my boyfriend, let him go." Miss South laughed, "Come on, you knew that you couldn't be together with him long. Come on, at his size you couldn't have a family with him. It's for the best that his life ends this way." Lisa shouted, "I don't care if I couldn't have a family with him! I love him! He is all I need!" "Aaww, how touching," Miss South says.

Does Miss South have a change of heart and throw you up?
143.title: You Thought It Was A Good Idea: You Were Wrong.

1431.content:
Miss South stood up, "Nope, in my belly he stays. You can tell anybody you want, they will believe me if I say I didn't eat him. So out of my office you go, find a new boyfriend." Miss South opened her office door and shoved Lisa out. Lisa ran off crying, and told everybody she saw, even the college president, and as Miss South said, nobody believed Lisa. They just thought that Lisa had hallucinated the whole thing and that she had just left you in her room, and when she showed them that you weren't there, they just said that you had probably wandered off someplace and would come back later.
         Meanwhile, you were pounding on the walls of Miss South's stomach, begging to be let out. She just did her best to ignore you and went on eating the rest of her lunch, which landed on top of you pinning you to the bottom of her stomach. You gave up, you were trapped with no escape. All that was left was to be digested and become fat on the hot ass of the sexy redheaded Miss South. "Well, I guess there are worse ways to go," you thought to yourself, "At least I had a purpose in the world." Hours later, you were gone, little bits of you heading further south in Miss South's body. After her last class, Miss South went home. Later that night she went to the bathroom and pushed what remained of you out of her lovely tight ass. She cleaned herself, flushed the toilet, and said, "Bye bye Jason, it was a pleasure making you a part of my sexy body."
1431.title: End In The Belly Of A Redheaded Beauty.

info.brief_description: College is hard when you are only 4 inches tall.
info.description:
Your name is Jason Little, you were once a normal college student, but one day you were exposed to a strange gas mixture when you were working alone on a project in the chemistry lab. The gas had the effect that it made you shrink to only four inches tall. That was a couple months ago, now in stead of the dorm hall where you use to stay, you now live with your girlfriend Lisa at a sorority house. She got permission from the heads of the sorority to let you stay. Lisa thought it was best so that she could keep you safe. Being at this height you can't continue your college career until a cure is found. But you aren't complaining, you get to stay in the care of your lovely girlfriend and living at the sorority, you are surrounded by many hot and beautiful girls. Sometimes your girlfriend takes you to class with her, sometimes she let's you stay at the sorority house. When you are by yourself at the sorority house, you like to wander around and also do your best to get food from the kitchen when you are hungry. Every once in awhile you get into a little trouble, like "accidentally" walking in on a girl who is undressed. One time you came close to get crushed by an angry girl. You do suspect that there are also some girls in the sorority that want you for their own purposes, so you do your best to avoid them. There are fifteen girls in the sorority house other than Lisa, so sometimes it is hard to tell who is nice and who is out to get you.

Characters:
Lisa: Your girlfriend, 20 years old, Long Brunette hair, 5ft 5ins, has a plump sexy body, C-cup breasts, nice round ass and thick thighs, and a plump little belly that is soft and is one of your favorite places to take a nap.
Kristy: 19 years old, Medium length blond hair, 5ft 5ins, has basically the same body characteristics as your girlfriend. You know that she is out to get you....in her belly. You would do well to avoid her. If she catches you she will eat you up, probably right there on the spot.
Natasha: 22 years old, long blond hair, 5ft 8ins, she is a sexy leggy girl with a tight round ass and lively C-cup breasts, she is one of the heads of the sorority, she is addicted to pleasuring herself sexually, and has eyed you many a time. If she gets a hold of you, be prepared to end up between her legs.
Rita: 21 years old, short red hair, 5ft 7ins, except for being a little taller than your girlfriend she looks the same body-wise. She is a culinary arts major, so of course she loves to cook. Watch out for her. Many times when Lisa was out of ear shot, Rita has expressed to you how she would love to make you the main ingredient in her next great recipe. So if she catches you alone and unprotected, prepare to end up in the oven or a frying pan and then served on a plate.

There are twelve other girls, and you don't know whether they are nice or like Kristy, Natasha, or Rita.

Rules:

1.) No guys besides Jason (you).
2.) Girls in the sorority house are to be between the ages of 18 and 23. If there is an outside girl or woman, no younger than 16, and no older than 30.
3.)Editions must be written in the second person, for example; "You went to the kitchen."
4.)Editions must be at least six good sentences long, meaning a paragraph. This is not what I mean:
         You were hungry. You went to the kitchen and to the counter. A hand grabbed you. It was Kristy. "I am hungry," she said, "You will be delicious." She dangled you over her mouth and was about to eat you when.....
----
You have to do a lot better than that. What I mean is that an edition should have some substance to it. For reference, look at some of the editions I made.
5.)Spell and grammatical check your work before you add it, I will not stand for bad spelling and obvious grammatical errors.

I won't delete if you follow the rules. Have fun.
